titles.title: Preventing Unnecessary Deaths During Life-Threatening Events Act
Preventing Unnecessary Deaths During Life-Threatening Events Act

To amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 so that procedures relating to termination of electric service provide that such service may not be terminated during any extreme heat weather event or extreme cold weather event, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

bill.summary:
Preventing Unnecessary Deaths During Life-Threatening Events Act
This bill modifies the procedures for terminating electric service under the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978; utilities may not terminate electricity during an extreme heat weather event or extreme cold weather event.
